attributes.review: this app isn’t it.   i went on it and it directed me towards the russian gov.    then to north korea’s.   also when i opened it i saw a cheeto w corn hair and my dog ran away bc of how scared it was.    it has now been 3 days since i’ve seen my dog and we don’t know when it will come home 😔😔 plz help us out by not supporting this ignorant and racist white supremacist
